questionText.en: Match the words with their definitions:

label.en: f. to meet or experience something unpleasant
b. behaving in an angry threatening way
g. nerve endings which receive information about changes in light, heat and causes the body to react in particular ways
c. to make something happen very quickly
a. organisms that live on or in another organism of a different species
d. a substance that makes the body produce antibodies
e. simple type of plants that grow on the surface

feedbackCorrect.en: Well done! You've matched all the biological terms correctly.
feedbackCorrect.ar: أحسنت! لقد طابقت جميع المصطلحات البيولوجية بشكل صحيح.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. راجع معاني الكلمات جيداً: 'encounter' يعني مواجهة أو مصادفة، 'aggressive' يعني عدواني، 'receptors' هي مستقبلات عصبية، 'trigger' يعني يثير أو يحفز، 'parasites' هي طفيليات، 'antigens' هي مولدات الضد، و 'fungi' هي فطريات.

supportContent.en: Complete the sentence with the correct form of an idiom from the list: [follow your heart, pain in the neck, jumped out of one’s skin, speak one’s mind, cost an arm and a leg]

questionText.en: 1. His sudden outbursts have made him a real <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='idiom1' placeholder='idiom...'> and a socially unwanted.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. المصطلح الذي يعني شخصًا مزعجًا للغاية هو 'pain in the neck'.

supportContent.en: Complete the sentence with the correct form of an idiom from the list: [follow your heart, pain in the neck, jumped out of one’s skin, speak one’s mind, cost an arm and a leg]

questionText.en: 2. Buying a brand new car is going to <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='idiom2' placeholder='idiom...'>. Maybe we should ride bikes.

idiom2.en: cost an arm and a leg

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. المصطلح الذي يعني أن شيئًا ما باهظ الثمن للغاية هو 'cost an arm and a leg'.

supportContent.en: Complete the sentence with the correct form of an idiom from the list: [follow your heart, pain in the neck, jumped out of one’s skin, speak one’s mind, cost an arm and a leg]

questionText.en: 3. My sister is very polite. She does not <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='idiom3' placeholder='idiom...'>.

feedbackCorrect.en: Correct! If she's polite, she might avoid speaking her mind too bluntly.
feedbackCorrect.ar: صحيح! إذا كانت مؤدبة، فقد تتجنب قول ما تفكر به بصراحة تامة.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. المصطلح الذي يعني قول ما يفكر به الشخص بصراحة هو 'speak one’s mind'. الجملة منفية ('does not').

supportContent.en: Complete the sentence with the correct form of an idiom from the list: [follow your heart, pain in the neck, jumped out of one’s skin, speak one’s mind, cost an arm and a leg]

questionText.en: 4. The best advice is to <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='idiom4' placeholder='idiom...'> but keep your eyes open.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. المصطلح الذي يعني اتباع مشاعرك العميقة هو 'follow your heart'.

supportContent.en: Complete the sentence with the correct form of an idiom from the list: [follow your heart, pain in the neck, jumped out of one’s skin, speak one’s mind, cost an arm and a leg]

questionText.en: 5. Our friend almost <input type='text' class='fill-blank-input' data-blank-id='idiom5' placeholder='idiom...'> when she learned her son and his wife were having triplets.

feedbackIncorrect.ar: الإجابة غير صحيحة. المصطلح الذي يعني الشعور بصدمة أو مفاجأة شديدة هو 'jumped out of one’s skin'. انتبه لتغيير الضمير ليتناسب مع 'she'.
